title: My Ex-Ex

description: A recently dumped attorney hires a psychic to help her win back her boyfriend. Things take an unexpected turn when another ex re-enters the picture.

title: Across The Line
cast: Sarah Jeffery, Simon Paul Mutuyimana, Denis Theriault, Jeremiah Sparks, Steven Love, Cara Ricketts, Jim Codrington, Shamier Anderson, Stephan James, Lanette Ware, Hugh Thompson
description: A black high school student sets his sights for the National Hockey League, but rising racial tensions in his community may jeopardize his goals.

title: Pants on Fire
cast: Bradley Steven Perry, Joshua J. Ballard, Tyrel Jackson Williams, Brittney Wilson, Taylor Russell, Nicholas Coombe, Rachelle Gillis, Kevin O'Grady
description: Jealous girlfriends and aliens are just some of the things Jack lied about to become popular. Now the lies are coming to life and ruining everything.

title: Trailer Park Boys Live at the North Pole
director: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells
cast: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells, John Dunsworth, Pat Roach, Jacob Rolfe, Marguerite McNeil, Doug Barron, Paul Doucette, Gareth Meagher
description: Bubbles's plan to spread the true meaning of Christmas is dashed by Julian's wish to cash in on the holiday and Ricky's quest to meet the real Santa.

title: Trailer Park Boys Live In F**kin' Dublin
director: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells
cast: Mike Smith, John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells, Pat Roach
description: The boys head to Ireland after winning a contest to see Rush but are arrested by immigration and must perform a community service puppet show.

title: The Captive
cast: Ryan Reynolds, Scott Speedman, Rosario Dawson, Mireille Enos, Kevin Durand, Alexia Fast, Christine Horne, Arsinée Khanjian, Ian Matthews, Bruce Greenwood, Aidan Shipley
description: Eight years after their daughter's abduction tore them apart, her parents receive enigmatic clues from the kidnapper hinting that she's still alive.

title: Dear Santa
cast: Amy Acker, David Haydn-Jones, Patrick Creery, Gina Holden, James Dugan, Margherita Donato, Brooklynn Proulx, James D. Hopkin, Bob Irvine
description: Finding a letter mailed to Santa by a girl asking for a new wife for her daddy, twentysomething Crystal sets out to make the girl's wishes come true.

title: My Babysitter's a Vampire: The Movie
cast: Matthew Knight, Vanessa Morgan, Atticus Mitchell, Cameron Kennedy, Kate Todd, Joe Dinicol, Ella Jonas Farlinger, Ari Cohen, Laura de Carteret, Hrant Alianak
description: When their parents head out for the evening, Ethan and his little sister get the babysitter of their nightmares: a fledgling vampire named Sarah.

title: Hunt to Kill
cast: Steve Austin, Gil Bellows, Gary Daniels, Marie Avgeropoulos, Emilie Ullerup, Michael Eklund, Eric Roberts, Michael Hogan, Donnelly Rhodes, Adrian Holmes
description: U.S. Border Patrol agent and deadly hunter Jim Rhodes takes violent revenge when a group of desperate thieves kidnaps his daughter after a robbery.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Xmas Special
cast: John Paul Tremblay, Robb Wells, John Dunsworth, Patrick Roach, Lucy Decoutere, Sarah Dunsworth, Cory Bowles, Barrie Dunn, Michael Jackson, Shelley Thompson
description: See what Sunnyvale Trailer Park was like back in the day, featuring Randy as a prostitute, J-Roc before he rapped and Barb and Lahey still together.

title: One Last Shot
cast: Robb Wells, John Paul Tremblay, John Dunsworth
description: In this low-budget short film, two best buddies meet up for a night of booze-fueled fun before one of them moves to Vancouver.
